Html: MS Research showed a demo of open and closed hand. People were not sure if it was a stock Kinect for Windows. If so, can we get a sample for this. Have a need for (better) hand tracking (especially on a table), and hand rotation.

Hi Crawfis,
    This might be an interesting article on Kinect for windows approach to [Kinect hand recognition](http://www.theverge.com/2013/3/6/4069598/kinect-for-windows-hand-detection-hands-on). We are due soon on supporting pinch to zoom and mouse click gestures events.
          Can you also explain your need/use-case for solving "(better) hand tracking (especially on a table), and hand rotation."
